package Assignment;

import java.util.HashSet;

public class Program15 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		HashSet<String> colors1=new HashSet();
		
		colors1.add("Pink");
		colors1.add("Blue");
		colors1.add("Peach");
		colors1.add("Black");
		colors1.add("White");
		
		System.out.println("HashSet 1 Contains : "+colors1);
		
		HashSet<String> colors2=new HashSet();
		
		colors2.add("Pink");
		colors2.add("Purple");
		colors2.add("Peach");
		colors2.add("Yellow");
		colors2.add("White");
		
		System.out.println("HashSet 2 Contains : "+colors2);
		
		colors1.retainAll(colors2);
		System.out.println("Same Elements in HashSet1 And HashSet2 Are : "+colors1);
		
		
	}
}
